channel.title: First steps on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in First steps on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Introduction
item.description: First steps Introduction XRechnung - the standard for electronic invoicing for public clients As of 27.11.2020, suppliers of public clients must send invoices in the so-called “XRechnung” format. This format is an XML-based data model that is currently being established as the standard for electronic invoices. According to the Decision of the IT Planning Council of 22.06.2017 (Link only available in German), XRechnung is decisive for the implementation of the Directive 2014/55/EU (Link only available in German) in Germany.

item.title: Test & Purchase
item.description: Testing and purchasing of the Connector 365 XRechnung App Here you will find all help and learning resources about testing and purchasing the Connector 365 XRechnung App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installation of the Connector 365 XRechnung App Here you will find all help and learning resources about installing the Connector 365 XRechnung App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.
